title: Adanti
description: Small vegetarian grocery store selling food and household items, such as bread bakes without yeast, veggie sausages, tofu, various dry food and sauces. This is one of 2 shops, situated in the Novy bazar market area and is easy to miss so look for it. Write in Russian "веган  постный"  to show to the salesperson as language may be an issue.
